name: Reanimation Protocol
text: Pick a friendly Necron Warrior or Flayed One model that was previously removed from play. Return that model to play with 1 wound within 3" of this model and more than 1" from enemy models. Mark the returned model as activated.

name: Prime Reanimation Protocol
text: Pick a friendly Immortal or Deathmark model that was previously removed from play. Return that model to play with 1 wound within 3" of this model and more than 1" from enemy models. Mark the returned model as activated.
